#include <stdio.h>

#include <string.h>

#define mod 998244353

#define MAX 8000

long long g1[MAX+1], g2[MAX+1], inverse[MAX+1];

void precompute() {

    g1[0] = 1;

    g1[1] =1;

    g2[0] =1;

    g2[1] =1;

    inverse[0] =0;

    inverse[1] =1;

    for (int i=2; i<=MAX; i++) {

        g1[i] = (g1[i-1] * i) % mod;

        int a = mod %i;

        int b = mod /i;

        inverse[i] = (mod - ( (inverse[a] * b) % mod )) % mod;

        if (inverse[i] <0) inverse[i] += mod;

        g2[i] = (g2[i-1] * inverse[i]) % mod;

    }

}

int cmb(int n, int r) {

    if (r <0 || r >n) return 0;

    if (r > n -r) r = n -r;

    return ( ( (g1[n] * g2[r]) % mod ) * g2[n -r] ) % mod;

}

int kumiawase(int p, int q) {

    return cmb(p + q -1, q-1);

}

int solve(int n, int K, int N) {

    int kumi = (n-1)/2;

    int ans =0;

    for (int p=0; p <=kumi; p++) {

        if (p > N) continue;

        int pow2_p =1;

        for (int i=0; i <p; i++) {

            pow2_p = (pow2_p *2) % mod;

        }

        int term1 = ( (pow2_p * cmb(kumi, p)) % mod ) * kumiawase(N -p, p + (K - 2*kumi - (n%2 ?0:1)) ) % mod;

        ans = (ans + term1) % mod;

        if (n%2 ==0 && (N -p -1) >=0) {

            int term2 = ( (pow2_p * cmb(kumi, p)) % mod ) * kumiawase(N -p -1, p + (K - 2*kumi - (n%2 ?0:1)) ) % mod;

            ans = (ans + term2) % mod;

        }

    }

    return ans;

}

int main() {

    int K, N;

    scanf("%d %d", &K, &N);

    precompute();

    // Compute first program's first output (i=2)

    int x = solve(2, K, N) % mod;

    // Process through second program's logic

    char str[20];

    sprintf(str, "%d", x);

    int len = strlen(str);

    char processed[20];

    int pos =0;

    if (len ==1) {

        strcpy(processed, str);

    } else {

        if (str[0] == '9') {

            processed[pos++] = '9';

            for (int i=1; i < len; i++) {

                int digit = str[i] - '0';

                if (digit >4) {

                    processed[pos++] = '0' + (9 - digit);

                } else {

                    processed[pos++] = str[i];

                }

            }

        } else {

            for (int i=0; i < len; i++) {

                int digit = str[i] - '0';

                if (digit >4) {

                    processed[pos++] = '0' + (9 - digit);

                } else {

                    processed[pos++] = str[i];

                }

            }

        }

    }

    processed[pos] = '\0';

    int y = atoi(processed);

    // Third program's step

    int g = gcd(360, y);

    int result = 360 / g;

    printf("%d\n", result);

    return 0;

}
